bergmark_d wrote:

>
> Dear Heritrix dev team,
>
> Having just downloaded and built heritrix-1.3.0 today,
> I thought I'd note that the DiskBacked{Queue,Decque}Tests
> all failed.  I had to move them out of the way to finish
> the build via Maven.

The unit tests work for me.  This looks like this 5.1.3 in release 
notes: 
http://crawler.archive.org/articles/releasenotes.html#1_0_0_limitations 
(Are you on a platform other than linux?).

>
> Also, if the AList changes we're playing with take hold, it
> might be good to leave getAList() visible, but deprecated,
> for backwards compatability.  There might be lots of code
> out there that invoke this method on the CrawlURI.
>
Ok. Done.

> And, as I stated in my last post, it would be nice to have
> a  "protected CreateCandidateURI(CrawlURI c)" method in the
> postprocessors.
>
I didn't take it away.  Its still there.

St.Ack

> Regards, D. (getting closer to passing info from parents
> to children)
>
>
